summary: The Internal Revenue Service collects taxes to fund federal programs and services. In FY24, IRS collected about $5.1 trillion in taxes and paid out more than $553 billion in tax refunds, credits, and other payments. We audit and issue opinions annually on IRS's financial statements and on related internal controls (e.g., processes to reasonably assure that transactions are properly authorized and recorded). In FY24, we...
title: Financial Audit: IRS's FY 2024 and FY 2023 Financial Statements
